alert.note: Alert for Brazoria; Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 08 at 4:32PM CST until January 08 at 5:00PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Brazoria County in southeastern Texas... Southeastern Harris County in southeastern Texas... * Until 500 PM CST. * At 432 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over northeastern Central Southwest, or over Astrodome Area, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pasadena, northwestern Pearland, northern Missouri City, Deer Park, South Houston, Bellaire, Galena Park, Jacinto City, South Belt / Ellington, Greater Hobby Area, Channelview, Astrodome Area, Macgregor, Greater Third Ward, Cloverleaf, Greater Eastwood, University Place, northern Clear Lake, Highlands, and Brookside Village. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CST for southeastern Texas.
